Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.GUI.GUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Terminal

    public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements Terminal
    Implements a GUI with all the method needed to handles to shows the information on the game window
